short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome plugin for viewing Fastr Frontend experiences

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fastr Frontend Chrome Extension
Take Total Control of Your Ecommerce Frontend—Now with Content Overrides!

Fastr Frontend is all about empowering you to own your site’s user experience—without lengthy dev cycles, restrictive templates, or long waits for new ideas to go live. The Fastr Frontend Chrome Extension is an integral companion to this mission, giving you a transparent, real-time view of all the AI-enhanced, dynamic content you’ve crafted. And with our newly added Overrides feature, you can now replace elements on any page with your Fastr experiences—perfect for instantly testing content or functionality on the fly.

New: Override and Replace Page Content
Define URL Patterns: Specify which pages to target (e.g., https://example.com/page/*).
Select Elements: Pinpoint the HTML you’d like to replace or enhance (e.g., a .header-banner).
Insert Scripts or Content: Dynamically inject Fastr experiences, scripts, or other code to preview how your experiences function on pages beyond your primary site.
No more guesswork or manual dev environment tinkering—just a few clicks, and your new experiences are live for you to test and validate instantly.

Total Frontend Control at Your Fingertips
Fastr Frontend was born out of a vision: remove operational bottlenecks and give non-technical users the ability to design, orchestrate, and deploy ecommerce experiences at scale. With the extension:

See how many experiences are running on your current page.
Highlight them visually by toggling a simple checkbox—no rummaging through code.
Empower everyone on your team to understand and refine what’s being served to customers, all in real time.
Design, Experiment, and Optimize—Without Disruption
Your ecommerce site should evolve as quickly as your customers’ expectations. Fastr Frontend streamlines workflows by letting you build dynamic content with just a few AI-driven prompts or via the Experience Canvas. Then, open the extension to:

Identify which experiences are live on the page.
Review variant details, content slot placements, and more.
Iterate quickly based on A/B test data to find what resonates with customers.
AI-Enhanced Adaptive Experiences
At the heart of Fastr Frontend is FastrAI, a learning engine that refines future experiences based on past performance. With the extension, you can see which AI-generated experiences (and variants) are active at any moment—no more guesswork about which version of a landing page or product module is running.

Say “Yes” to New Ideas—Faster
Gone are the days of passing change requests between teams and waiting weeks to see results. Fastr Frontend’s real-time deployment means you can instantly test out:

New offers and banners
Hero images and layouts
Promotional modules
Pop open the Chrome Extension, confirm they’re live, highlight them, and refine everything on the spot. The new Overrides feature extends this even further, letting you do quick “what if?” tests on practically any page, whether you own it or not.

Seamless Integration with Your Existing Stack
Fastr Frontend integrates with your CMS, analytics, payment gateways, and more. This extension helps confirm those integrations are delivering content correctly by showing exactly which experiences are present and where they’re running.

Your Brand, Your Aesthetic, Your Impact
Because Fastr Frontend isn’t bound by rigid templates, you can customize your store’s appearance at will:

Roll out new layouts in minutes.
Visually confirm those changes in the extension.
Adapt continuously, guided by real-world performance data.
Empowering Leading Brands—and You
From Timberland to Carhartt to Urbanstems, top ecommerce brands already trust Fastr Frontend to deliver nimble, data-driven experiences. By installing the extension, you’ll see firsthand how easy it is to implement and verify changes on your site.

From Start to Scale—Fastr Frontend Has You Covered
Our full suite of professional services includes:

Managed Services: For continuous improvements without taxing internal teams.
Content & Ecommerce Strategy: Expert roadmaps to guide you toward key business goals.
Development & Integration Services: Fast-track new capabilities in your tech stack.
Performance Services: Optimize speed, SEO, and engagement.
Design Services: Achieve on-brand visuals and layouts that stand out.
Start Seeing Your Site Differently
Installing the extension is like putting on a new set of glasses:

Overview: Quickly see all experiences running on the page.
Breakdown: Understand each experience’s details, from names to variant counts.
Highlight Toggle: Visually illuminate each experience’s on-page placement.
Always Improving with Adaptive Intelligence
As FastrAI learns from performance data, it automatically refines your experiences over time. By watching the extension, you can track this evolution in real time—identifying which variants yield the best results without diving into any code.

From Inspiration to Implementation—In Minutes
Use FastrAI and the Experience Canvas to design new pages or modules, deploy them instantly, then observe and iterate through the extension’s clear interface. Test, learn, and improve continuously—no more living with stale, outdated content while you wait for developer cycles.

A Future-Proofed Approach
Fastr Frontend’s decoupled architecture means you can easily adopt new services or technologies without overhauling your entire platform. The Chrome Extension (especially with its new Overrides feature) keeps pace, ensuring you always have instant visibility into what’s being delivered to your customers.

One-Stop Visualization for Your Whole Team
No matter if you’re a merchandiser, marketer, designer, or developer:

Merchandisers can confirm that seasonal campaigns are live.
Marketers can verify promotional content displays properly.
Designers can visually inspect new layouts and ensure branding consistency.
Developers can quickly test experiences on multiple pages or site environments with a simple override.
From Free Trials to Full Transformations
Try Fastr Frontend free, spin up a few experiences, and use the extension to confirm everything is deployed as intended. If you need deeper insights or hands-on support, our free consultation gives you five game-changing tips to supercharge your store—and you can track it all in real time with the extension.

Your Journey, Your Way
With Fastr Frontend and its Chrome Extension, there are no more obstacles to fast, flexible ecommerce site updates. Whether you’re testing a brand-new homepage layout or a minor tweak to a PDP, Fastr Frontend helps you make changes instantly while the extension keeps you 100% informed of what’s live.

Get Started Today
Install the Fastr Frontend Chrome Extension and:

Leverage Overrides: Replace or inject content on any page—test faster, learn more.
Highlight AI-Enhanced Content: Immediately see how many experiences are running on a page.
Inspect Variants: Drill into specific details for each experience.
Iterate in Real Time: Update experiences, refresh, and see them live in seconds.
Start transforming your ecommerce store into a dynamic, adaptive environment that responds to data, aligns with your brand vision, and continuously delights your customers. With Fastr Frontend—and now the override-powered extension—the possibilities are limited only by your imagination.
